javascript Axios

parameters.name: appointment-type
parameters.description: The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: The Schedule Resource that we are seeking a slot within

parameters.name: service-category
parameters.description: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

parameters.name: service-type
parameters.description: The type of appointments that can be booked into the slot

parameters.name: specialty
parameters.description: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The free/busy status of the appointment

resource.comment: Assessments should be performed before requesting appointments in this slot.
